name: Joined to a Fireball
description:
Controls:  WASD to move. Click the mouse in any direction to dash there.

Description:  You are joined to a fireball which is on an elastic line. Swing the fireball around to destroy enemies. You health and the elasticity of the connection are proportional, so get health pickups to regain control of your fireball.

Note:  This was made for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam. This was my first game jam and I had a ton of fun doing it. Please enjoy. Also, the particle effects are taken directly from Daniel Shiffman's tutorials. All the rest was written by your's truely.

Source Code:  https://github.com/scottbigbrain/gmtk2021
